channel.title: Interface text
channel.description: I'm having a hard time guessing where the interface text id's are. [img]http://s27.postimg.org/stpnuznsj/111.png[/img] someone suggested i use an interface emulator? I have no clue on how to use it. or something else that can help would be very nice...

item.title: Interface text
item.dc:creator: @cammyPVPftw cammyPVPftw
item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

can you link me a tutorial because i have a hard time using the search bar no joke or sarcasm.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

cammyPVPftw:

thanks btw. Mind me asking what program you use to find?

I didn’t use a program. I dumped the id’s from a client some time back.

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Here:

Parent: 4909 Id: 4911 "Text" Parent: 4909 Id: 4912 "Close Window" Parent: 4909 Id: 4913 "Text" Parent: 4909 Id: 4914 "Text" Parent: 4909 Id: 4915 "Text" Parent: 4909 Id: 4916 "Text" Parent: 4909 Id: 4918 "Text"

item.title: Interface text
item.dc:creator: @cammyPVPftw cammyPVPftw
item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

should of gave a better description on what interface i was using. Its 4909
here is what i have so far.

c.getPA().showInterface(4909); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" Congratulations!", 4913); //Title c.getPA().sendFrame126("@pur@You completed Ancient Magiks! ", 4914); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@pur@You've found a new area and a new altar!", 4915); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@pur@I can now cast ancient magiks!", 4916); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@pur@a", 4917); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@pur@b", 4918); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@pur@c", 4919); }

Read full topic

item.title: Interface text
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Parent: 297	Id: 299	"Congratulations!"
Parent: 297	Id: 300	"Close Window"
Parent: 297	Id: 301	""
Parent: 297	Id: 303	"Total Points:"
Parent: 297	Id: 304	"%1"
Parent: 297	Id: 6156	"You are awarded"
Parent: 297	Id: 4444	"0"
Parent: 297	Id: 6158	"Quest points."
Parent: 12140	Id: 12142	"Congratulations!"
Parent: 12140	Id: 12143	"Close"
Parent: 12140	Id: 12144	"You have completed Death Plateau!"
Parent: 12140	Id: 12146	"Quest Points:"
Parent: 12140	Id: 12147	"%1"
Parent: 12140	Id: 12149	"You are awarded:"
Parent: 12140	Id: 12150	"Line 1"
Parent: 12140	Id: 12151	"Line 2"
Parent: 12140	Id: 12152	"Line 3"
Parent: 12140	Id: 12153	"Line 4"
Parent: 12140	Id: 12154	"Line 5"
Parent: 12140	Id: 12155	"Line 6"

Parent ID = the interface ID
Id = the string id.
Try those.

Read full topic
